creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
description: narrow city street with tall buildings; sketchy style; lamp on bracket, LRQ; several very sketchy figures in windows and on street; clock tower at center background
inscription: LLC, in pencil: [4]; on back, in pencil: [60 (circled)]
provenance: Edith and Norman Garmezy, Edina; given to MIA, 2001.
signed: LRC, in pencil: [John Marin]; LLC, in the plate: [St. Gervais / par / Rue Grenier / sur L\'eau / Paris]; LRC, in the plate: [Marin / 09]
title: St. Gervais, Rue Grenier sur L'Eau, Paris
